RelayType RelayType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll

Specifies an enumeration of relay type.

Edit

In this Article

[DataContract(Name = "RelayType", Namespace = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2009/05/servicebus/connect")]
public enum RelayType<DataContract(Name:="RelayType", Namespace:="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2009/05/servicebus/connect")>
Public Enum RelayType
Attributes
DataContractAttribute

Fields

Http Http

The HTTP relay.
NetEvent NetEvent

The NetEvent relay.
NetOneway NetOneway

The NetOneway relay.
NetTcp NetTcp

The NetTcp relay.
None None

The relay is None.
